backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor placeholder with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains pre-generated summaries for all frontend source files used in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark mode with OKLCH color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Initializes theme, Web3 provider, error boundary, dashboard, and global Toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/BalanceView.tsx: Displays BNB and token balances with refresh, watched-token management, valuations, and read‑only or wrong‑network alerts.
frontend/src/components/ContractInfo.tsx: Shows vault contract details, owner address, network info, and provides clipboard copy and BscScan link actions.
frontend/src/components/DepositForm.tsx: BNB balance display and token deposit form with validation, token selector, and deposit execution via vault operations.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a detailed error card with reload option and optional stack trace.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation header with app title and a theme toggle button using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/TokenSelectorInp: Token selection input supporting dropdown selection, manual entry, and address validation.
frontend/src/components/WalletConnect.ts: Wallet connection component handling MetaMask presence, network switching, mobile guidance, and error states.
frontend/src/components/WithdrawForm.tsx: Form for withdrawing BNB or tokens from the vault with validation, token selection, and transaction handling.
frontend/src/global.d.ts: Extends the Window interface with Ethereum provider typings for MetaMask.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
Fetches BNB and token prices to compute USD and BNB valuations for balances with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating Web3 is used instead of Internet Computer queries.
Manages a persistent token catalog with labels in localStorage, supporting add/update/remove and dropdown formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultBalances.ts: Fetches BNB and ERC‑20 token balances from the vault contract with per‑token error handling and formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultInfo.ts: Loads and exposes the vault owner address with loading and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useVaultOperations.ts: Provides deposit and withdrawal actions for tokens and BNB using on‑chain contract calls with state flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useWatchedTokens.ts: Stores and validates a persistent list of watched token addresses using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useWeb3.tsx: Implements a Web3 context for MetaMask/BSC connection, contract calls, transactions, and wallet state management.
frontend/src/index.css: Initializes Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus accessibility and mobile touch rules.
frontend/src/lib/contracts.ts: Provides contract method encoding/decoding helpers and known function signatures for interacting with a vault contract.
frontend/src/lib/evm.ts: Implements low-level EVM utilities for address validation and uint256 encoding/decoding, plus unit parsing/formatting.
frontend/src/lib/prices.ts: Fetches BNB and token prices from CoinGecko and formats prices for display.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a classnames utility combining clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard UI, handling wallet state, network checks, and tabbed views for balances, deposits, and withdrawals.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the current DApp build state, including goals, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature specifications for a BSC vault dashboard.
